description: Main entry point and core setup for a Flutter attendance tracker app, including Firebase initialization, theme setup, route configuration, and basic UI screens (login, attendance, reports).

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up MaterialApp with theme and route mapping.

classes.name: SplashRouterGate
classes.description: Widget that determines initial route based on user authentication state.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Placeholder login screen with fields for email and password.

classes.name: AttendanceScreen
classes.description: Main attendance display with list of students and attendance toggling.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application; initializes environment and Firebase, then runs the app.

methods.name: _initFirebase
methods.description: Configures Firebase initialization, optionally connecting to local emulators based on environment variables.

methods.name: _decide
methods.description: Determines navigation route based on current Firebase user authentication state.
